testcase.name: getTestCaseName('core_collectiveattr_015: Add PostalAddress and c-PostalAddress collective attributes with the 2 syntaxes')

sequence.message: 'Test Name = %s' % STAXCurrentTestcase
sequence.script: coreattrLdif15='%s/core/ldifs/collectiveattr-15.ldif' % remote.data baseDN='ou=People,o=collectiveattr tests,dc=example,dc=com' targetDN1='uid=trigden,ou=North,ou=America,%s' % baseDN targetDN2='uid=scarter,ou=Asia,%s' % baseDN
sequence.message: '++ Add 2 collective attributes PostalAddress and c-PostalAddress, should pass'
'++ Search 2 attributes in user trigden'
sequence.call: { 'expectedString' : 'postalAddress: Example Com\$ 40388 Sixth Street.*', 'returnString' : returnString , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC , }
{ 'expectedString' : 'c-PostalAddress: Example Com\$30754 College Street.*', 'returnString' : returnString , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC , }
sequence.message: '++ Search attribute collectiveAttributeSubentries in user trigden '
'++ Search the 2 attributes in user scarter'
sequence.call: { 'dsInstanceHost' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_HOST , 'dsInstancePort' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PORT , 'dsInstanceDn' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DN , 'dsInstancePswd' : DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_PSWD , 'dsBaseDN' : targetDN2 , 'dsFilter' : 'objectclass=*' , 'dsAttributes' : 'PostalAddress c-PostalAddress' }
{ 'expectedString' : 'PostalAddress: Example Com\$ 40388 Sixth Street.*', 'returnString' : returnString , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC , }
{ 'expectedString' : 'c-PostalAddress: Example Com\$30754 College Street.*', 'returnString' : returnString , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC , }
